English: Xiahe county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture `甘~`南~`藏族~`自治~`州~[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet

d.f: `縣~`名~。`位於~`甘肅省~`蘭州市~`西南~，`因~`瀕~`大夏~`河~`而~`得名~。`地形~`多~`為~`三~`千~`公尺~`以上~`之~`高原~，`屬~`大陸性氣候~，`居民~`多~`為~`藏族~，`以~`畜牧~`為~`其~`經濟~`來源~。

English: Xiahe county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture `甘~`南~`藏族~`自治~`州~[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
